nodes.text: The Wazta sector was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories, and contained both the Lotho Minor and Vassek star systems, as well as the location Wazta. The Lutrillian Cross hyperspace route passed through the sector.

During the Clone Wars in 21 BBY, an engagement between Kaleesh Separatist Alliance General Grievous and the Galactic Republic forces of Jedi General Kit Fisto took place within the Wazta sector on the third moon of the planet Vassek in the Vassek system. Later, in 20 BBY, the Dathomirian Zabrak Nightbrother, Savage Opress, undertook a mission to the planet Lotho Minor in the Lotho Minor system, where he went to search for his long lost brother, Darth Maul, on the planet.

The Wazta sector first appeared in the new Star Wars canon in "Lair of Grievous," the tenth episode of the first season of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series, which aired on December 12, 2008. The sector was later identified in the sixty-second issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around March 30, 2016. The Wazta sector originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in "The Clone Wars: The Dreams of General Grievous," a webcomic in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars webcomic series authored by Pablo Hidalgo and published on December 10, 2008.
